docs.abstract: The automaker said sales of the Model 3 sedan increased 13 percent over the previous quarter, but the price cut could signal softening demand.
docs.snippet: The automaker said sales of the Model 3 sedan increased 13 percent over the previous quarter, but the price cut could signal softening demand.
docs.lead_paragraph: Tesla reported a record quarter on Wednesday, and investors responded with a sell-off.

headline.main: Tesla Reports Record Output, but Cuts Prices, and Its Shares Plunge
headline.print_headline: Tesla Reports Record Output, but Demand May Soften

docs.abstract: Ms. Zirinsky, 66, is a legend in television news and a beloved figure within the network’s news division. She takes over at a time of intense turmoil.
docs.snippet: Ms. Zirinsky, 66, is a legend in television news and a beloved figure within the network’s news division. She takes over at a time of intense turmoil.
docs.lead_paragraph: Susan Zirinsky is a legend in the world of television news.

headline.main: ‘She Literally Never Stops.’ CBS News, in Need of Fixing, Turns to Susan Zirinsky.
headline.print_headline: Bright Light In Dark Time At CBS News

docs.abstract: After the worst year for stocks in a decade, investors are eager to hear what executives expect in 2019 as companies report fourth-quarter earnings.
docs.snippet: After the worst year for stocks in a decade, investors are eager to hear what executives expect in 2019 as companies report fourth-quarter earnings.
docs.lead_paragraph: It’s time to see the numbers.

headline.main: Investors Were Spooked About Profits. Now Come the Facts.

docs.abstract: Mr. Spielberg, a Hollywood titan for more than four decades, has been cast as an anti-streaming Luddite. The reality is more complex.
docs.snippet: Mr. Spielberg, a Hollywood titan for more than four decades, has been cast as an anti-streaming Luddite. The reality is more complex.
docs.lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES — It has the makings of a great screenplay: As the future of an entire industry hangs in the balance, the ultimate establishment figure — a genius in his fourth decade of domination — goes to battle with a menacing interloper.

headline.main: Blockbuster Battle Between Steven Spielberg and Netflix Fizzles

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: ACADEMY OF MOTION PICTURE ARTS AND SCIENCES

docs.abstract: Today’s solutions for fighting spam and scam calls are ineffective. But the onus should be on the phone companies, not you, to solve this problem.
docs.snippet: Today’s solutions for fighting spam and scam calls are ineffective. But the onus should be on the phone companies, not you, to solve this problem.
docs.lead_paragraph: The robocalls come when you are driving and they bother you at night. It doesn’t matter if you’re in bed or in a meeting.

headline.main: You Can’t Stop Robocalls. You Shouldn’t Have To.

docs.abstract: Stocks slumped from the start, with selling worsening through the day. Tech and industrial shares weighed heavily on the market.
docs.snippet: Stocks slumped from the start, with selling worsening through the day. Tech and industrial shares weighed heavily on the market.
docs.lead_paragraph: The stock market’s strong start to the year stalled on Tuesday, amid growing pessimism about the prospects for a deal to defuse trade tensions between China and the United States.

headline.main: Stocks Tumble as China Trade-Deal Concerns Resurface
headline.print_headline: Market Falls as Trade Concerns Resurface

docs.abstract: Mr. Pearlman’s ARP synthesizers were once ubiquitous in pop and electronic music. By the mid-1970s, they commanded 40 percent of the market.
docs.snippet: Mr. Pearlman’s ARP synthesizers were once ubiquitous in pop and electronic music. By the mid-1970s, they commanded 40 percent of the market.
docs.lead_paragraph: Alan R. Pearlman, the engineer who founded the synthesizer company ARP Instruments and designed its pioneering equipment, died on Jan. 5 in Newton, Mass. He was 93.

headline.main: Alan R. Pearlman, Synthesizer Pioneer, Dies at 93
headline.print_headline: Alan R. Pearlman, 93, Early Synthesizer Designer Who Commanded Market

docs.abstract: Consumer-sentiment readings are declining, and more Americans rate President Trump’s economic policies poorly, as the impasse in Washington drags on.
docs.snippet: Consumer-sentiment readings are declining, and more Americans rate President Trump’s economic policies poorly, as the impasse in Washington drags on.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — The government shutdown and a late-year slump in the stock market have eroded Americans’ optimism for the economy and support for President Trump’s economic policies, new surveys show.

headline.main: Polls Show Government Shutdown Is Eroding Faith in Economy
headline.print_headline: Polls Show Decline in Optimism, a Potential Warning for the Economy

byline.original: By Jim Tankersley and Ben Casselman

docs.abstract: In new filings submitted late Thursday, the Democratic National Committee, whose computers were breached in 2016, said it was on the receiving end of a so-called spearphishing campaign in November.
docs.snippet: In new filings submitted late Thursday, the Democratic National Committee, whose computers were breached in 2016, said it was on the receiving end of a so-called spearphishing campaign in November.
docs.lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO — The Democratic National Committee believes it was targeted in a hacking attempt by a Russian group in the weeks after the midterm elections last year, according to court documents filed late Thursday.

headline.main: D.N.C. Says It Was Targeted Again by Russian Hackers After ’18 Election
headline.print_headline: D.N.C. Filing Says Hackers From Russia Struck Again

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Russian Interference in 2016 US Elections and Ties to Trump Associates

docs.abstract: AT&T, one of the biggest advertisers in the U.S., had balked because offensive content too often accompanied its ads. Now it says YouTube has addressed the issue.
docs.snippet: AT&T, one of the biggest advertisers in the U.S., had balked because offensive content too often accompanied its ads. Now it says YouTube has addressed the issue.
docs.lead_paragraph: AT&T thinks YouTube is safe for advertisers again.

headline.main: AT&T to Advertise on YouTube Again After a Nearly 2-Year Holdout
headline.print_headline: AT&T to Resume Advertising on YouTube After Nearly 2 Years
